Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.decorators.block_

from threading import RLock

loc = RLock()



[docs]def synchronized(function):
    def _synchronized(*args, **kw):
        loc.acquire()
        print(loc)
        try:
            return function(*args, **kw)
        finally:
            loc.release()
            print(loc)

    return _synchronized




[docs]@synchronized
def thread_safe():
    pass




[docs]@synchronized
def thread_safe2():
    pass



if __name__ == "__main__":
    thread_safe()
    thread_safe2()
